page.title: 05A FAIR OAK FAMILY DAY
page.content: I awake first when we are going shopping. I get up first so that I can prepare myself. I wear something smart. Most times we go to buy food. We use our car to get there as we shop in Eastleigh or Southampton. There are not many shops in Fair Oak. My Dad drives and Mum makes a list of things we need. We all keep together when we go out even if we are not going shopping. We normally work together. First we find the things we need, compare the prices and then Dad pays for the best quality and the lowest price. We take a lot of money to the shops. Sometimes we have our lunch at the shops.We sometimes take my best friend,Lisa, with us. In the shops you must behave because they are crowded and you might damage the things that are for sale.
